note: Dropbox OAuth access token; if unset, uses dev stub.
Upload chunk size in bytes for resumable uploads.
If true, attempt to create or reuse a share link after upload.
SMTP host for email delivery. If unset, module writes to dev outbox stub.
SMTP port for email delivery. If unset, module writes to dev outbox stub.
Sender email address used in the From header. If unset, module writes to dev outbox stub.
SMTP username. If unset, module writes to dev outbox stub. If set, EMAIL_SMTP_PASSWORD must also be set.
SMTP password. If unset, module writes to dev outbox stub. Required if EMAIL_SMTP_USERNAME is set.
Whether to use STARTTLS. Defaults to true.
If set, module creates a GitHub Release and uploads assets. If unset, module writes a deterministic dev stub to outputs/outbox.
Microsoft Graph OAuth access token with Files.ReadWrite; if unset, uses dev stub.
Upload chunk size in bytes for resumable uploads (Graph upload session).
If true, attempt to create or reuse a share link after upload.
Google Custom Search API key (used by wxi).
Custom Search Engine (cx) id (used by wxi).
Google API key for Custom Search API.
